title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Teams in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Teams Hendrick Motorsports has 161.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Teams Front Row Motorsports.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Teams in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Teams Hendrick Motorsports has 161.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Teams Front Row Motorsports.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Teamss.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and lowest at Teams Front Row Motorsports.
Teams Richard Childress Racing has the second highest value for Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 161.0 between the maximum Teams Hendrick Motorsports and minimum Teams Front Row Motorsports.

Teams Hendrick Motorsports is higher than any other Teamss with value 180.0, followed by Richard Childress Racing, and Joe Gibbs Racing. Down to Teams Front Row Motorsports with the lowest value 19.0.
The Teams Front Row Motorsports has 1.82 times less Revenue in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Teamss, we get total 793.0.
